title: Login success with valid credentials
description: Verify that the login form accepts valid credentials (User ID: 1111, Password: 1111) and redirects the user to the protected dashboard page with a welcome message.

steps.description: Navigate to the landing page.
Click the 'Enter Dashboard' button to reveal the inline login form.
Enter User ID as '1111' and Password as '1111'.
Click the login button.
Verify that the user is redirected to the dashboard page.
Check that the dashboard displays a welcome message with the username.

title: Login failure with invalid credentials
description: Verify that the login form rejects invalid credentials and displays shake animations and error messages on both input fields.

steps.description: Navigate to the landing page.
Click the 'Enter Dashboard' button to reveal the inline login form.
Enter invalid User ID and/or Password.
Click the login button.
Verify that shake animation is triggered on both input fields and icons.
Ensure contextual error messages and red border styling are displayed on inputs.
Confirm form fields retain focus on User ID input after failed login.

title: Login form validation for empty fields
description: Check that submitting the login form with empty User ID or Password fields triggers validation errors with shake animations and appropriate messages.

steps.description: Open the landing page.
Reveal inline login form by clicking 'Enter Dashboard'.
Attempt to submit the form with both fields empty.
Verify shake animations are displayed on User ID and Password fields.
Check for error messages indicating fields must not be empty.

title: Password visibility toggle functionality
description: Validate that clicking the Eye/EyeOff icon toggles the password input field visibility between masked and plain text.

steps.description: Access the landing page and reveal the inline login form.
Enter text into the password field.
Click the password visibility toggle icon.
Ensure the password field value changes from masked to plain text.
Click the toggle icon again.
Confirm the password field is masked again.

title: Session persistence across page refreshes
description: Ensure that once logged in, the user's authenticated state is persisted using localStorage and remains active after page reload, redirecting automatically to dashboard.

steps.description: Log in successfully using valid credentials.
Refresh the browser page.
Verify the user remains authenticated and stays on the dashboard page.

title: Logout clears session and redirects to landing page
description: Verify that clicking the logout button on the dashboard clears the stored session and redirects to the landing page with the login button visible.

steps.description: Log in successfully and arrive at dashboard.
Click the logout button.
Confirm session storage is cleared.
Verify redirection to landing page with 'Enter Dashboard' button visible.

title: Protected route blocks unauthenticated access to dashboard
description: Ensure unauthenticated users attempting to access the dashboard URL directly get redirected to the landing page.

steps.description: Open dashboard URL without logging in.
Verify the user is redirected to the landing page.

title: Public route redirects authenticated users from landing page to dashboard
description: Verify that authenticated users trying to access the landing page get redirected automatically to the dashboard.

steps.description: Log in successfully.
Attempt to navigate manually to the landing page URL.
Confirm automatic redirection to dashboard.

title: Inline login form animation transition
description: Verify smooth fade/zoom animation transitions of 0.5s duration between 'Enter Dashboard' button and inline login form on the landing page.

steps.description: Load the landing page.
Click 'Enter Dashboard' button.
Verify the button fades out and login form fades/zooms in within 0.5 seconds.
Click cancel or successful login to hide login form.
Confirm the login form fades out and 'Enter Dashboard' button fades back in smoothly.

title: Dashboard preview carousel updates on hover and click
description: Validate that hovering and clicking on each of the nine dashboard option modules updates the preview image immediately on the landing pageâ€™s dashboard preview carousel.

steps.description: Open the landing page.
Hover over each dashboard option module one at a time.
Verify the preview image updates immediately to correspond with the hovered module.
Click on each dashboard option module.
Confirm the preview image updates immediately upon click.

title: Sticky header navigation behavior on mobile devices
description: Test that the header navigation bar hides on scroll down and shows on scroll up on mobile devices (viewport <768px) while maintaining smooth scrolling to sections on link clicks.

steps.description: Load the landing page on a device or viewport with width less than 768px.
Scroll down the page.
Verify the header navigation bar hides on scroll down.
Scroll up the page.
Confirm the header navigation bar reappears on scroll up.
Click on a navigation link.
Ensure the page scrolls smoothly to the target section.

title: Scroll-triggered animations with Intersection Observer
description: Verify that various landing page sections trigger staggered animations when scrolled into view using Intersection Observer, and that unobserving occurs after animation to optimize performance.

steps.description: Load the landing page.
Scroll through highlights, features, benefits, about, and footer sections one by one.
Confirm appropriate staggered animations trigger on each section when it enters viewport.
Scroll back up and down repeatedly.
Verify animations do not retrigger multiple times and Intersection Observer stops observing after the first animation.

title: Mobile Highlights carousel auto-rotation
description: Test auto-rotation every 3 seconds of the mobile highlights carousel with smooth fade and scale transitions cycling through system highlight messages.

steps.description: Load the landing page on a mobile device or narrow viewport.
Verify the highlights carousel automatically rotates through 'Real-time updates', 'Simplified workflow', and 'Insightful reports' every 3 seconds.
Observe smooth opacity and scale transitions during rotations.

title: Keyboard navigation and accessibility in login form
description: Verify that input fields in the login form support keyboard navigation with Enter key moving focus between User ID, Password, and Login button, and that auto-focus sets on User ID field when form appears.

steps.description: Open landing page and reveal inline login form.
Check that User ID input is auto-focused.
Type User ID and press Enter key.
Verify focus moves to Password input.
Type Password and press Enter key.
Focus moves to Login button.
Press Enter key to submit the form.
Verify form submits or triggers validation accordingly.

title: Loading spinner and button disable during login submission
description: Ensure that while the login request is processing, a loading spinner with fade-in/zoom-in animation is visible, the login button is disabled to prevent duplicate submissions, and states are reset properly on success or failure.

steps.description: Open login form.
Enter valid credentials and click login.
Verify loading spinner appears with animation.
Confirm login button is disabled during loading.
After success or failure, check loading spinner disappears and button is enabled.

title: Image lazy loading with fade-in for dashboard previews
description: Validate that dashboard preview images are lazy loaded and fade in smoothly improving perceived performance on the landing page.

steps.description: Visit landing page.
Scroll to dashboard preview carousel.
Confirm preview images load lazily only when about to enter viewport.
Verify images fade in smoothly on load.

title: Animated hero section text cycle and speed
description: Test the word-by-word text reveal cycling through promotional messages with configured reveal speed, pause durations, and smooth transitions in the hero section.

steps.description: Load landing page.
Observe hero text revealing words one by one at configured speed.
Verify cycling through all promotional messages with correct pause durations.

title: Responsive layout adapts on window resize
description: Verify the application UI components including header navigation, carousels, and sections adjust their layout and behavior correctly when resizing the browser window between mobile and desktop breakpoints.

steps.description: Open landing page on desktop viewport.
Check header navigation shows desktop layout.
Resize window to mobile viewport (<768px).
Confirm header navigation switches to mobile layout with scroll-based show/hide behavior.
Resize back to desktop.
Verify UI components revert properly.

title: Clickable company logo reloads page
description: Verify that clicking the company logo in the header reloads the landing page properly.

steps.description: Navigate to landing page and scroll down.
Click on the company logo in the header.
Page reloads and resets scroll position to top.
